mapper.insert: INSERT INTO photoGallery (photoGalleryNum, subject, content, hitCount, imageFilename, reg_date, modify_date, showphotoGallery, schoolId) VALUES (photoGallery_seq.nextval, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hitCount}, #{imageFilename}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{showphotoGallery}, #{schoolId})
mapper.update: UPDATE photoGallery SET subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, hitCount = #{hitCount}, imageFilename = #{imageFilename}, modify_date = SYSDATE, showphotoGallery = #{showphotoGallery}, schoolId = #{schoolId} WHERE photoGalleryNum = #{photoGalleryNum}
mapper.select: SELECT photoGalleryNum, subject, content, hitCount, imageFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showphotoGallery, schoolId FROM photoGallery WHERE photoGalleryNum = #{photoGalleryNum}

SELECT photoGalleryNum, subject, content, hitCount, imageFilename, TO_CHAR(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_date, TO_CHAR(modify_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS modify_date, showphotoGallery, schoolId FROM photoGallery
AND schoolId = #{schoolId}
AND subject LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY photoGalleryNum DESC
